page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart u style svg method

argument.name: type
argument.description: The type of SVG style to get. Either "line", "fill" or "both".

argument.name: defaultColor
argument.description: The default color to use is the.

argument.name: drawSettings
argument.description: The draw settings for the line and/or fill to style. If the type is "both" then this should have a "line" and/or "fill" sub-property. For the draw settings see *[link:A5.chart Definition Line Object]* and *[link:A5.chart Definition Fill Object]*.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The chart data. See *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*.

argument.name: path
argument.description: An optional name to store the result in if the result is going to be used repeatedly.

page.description: Get style for the "line" and/or "fill" of a chart SVG element.
